msg: Fix Jisp based persistent store: close database and index files on shutdown
and re-use existing files on startup.

author: mcconnell
msg: Remove project.xml reference to ${maven.conf.dir} which is not functioning nrmally in maven beta-10.  Also, updated block descriptors to bring then up to 3.0 format.
